data.title: Idaho State students administer Covid-19 vaccine in Idaho and Alaska, Outdoor Writers of American has opportunities for students, Dr. Gabriel Bargen named new Interim Executive Director at ISU-Meridia
data.meta_description:
Idaho State students administer Covid-19 vaccine in Idaho and Alaska, Outdoor Writers of American has opportunities for students, Dr. Gabriel Bargen named new Interim Executive Director at ISU-Meridian, Idaho State Ships Freezers Statewide for Covid Vaccine Storage, ISU’s Structural Laboratory gets a significant upgrade, adds new visualization capability
